term.title: colloidal electrolyte

item.text: An electrolyte which gives ions of which at least one is of colloidal size. This term therefore includes hydrophobic sols, ionic associationcolloids, and polyelectrolytes.

sources.item: PAC, 1972, 31, 577. 'Manual of Symbols and Terminology for Physicochemical Quantities and Units, Appendix II: Definitions, Terminology and Symbols in Colloid and Surface Chemistry' on page 607 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac197231040577)
